resources.string: "Details: Cat ipsum dolor sit amet, vommit food and eat it again. Annoy kitten brother with poking destroy couch as revenge for my left donut is missing, as is my right but demand to be let outside at once, and expect owner to wait for me as i think about it and slap kitten brother with paw. Under the bed. Meow meow to be let out sleep on keyboard, yet meow for food, then when human fills food dish, take a few bites of food and continue meowing. Cat snacks. Meowwww cats secretly make all the worlds muffins hate dog, yet wake up wander around the house making large amounts of noise jump on top of your humans bed and fall asleep again claw drapes. Roll over and sun my belly kitty kitty has closed eyes but still sees you and caticus cuteicus.
